intro: I am a 22-year-old computer science student studying at Aalto University, majoring in Machine Learning, Data Science and Artificial Intelligence. Currently I am most interested in the future of web, machine learning and artificial intelligence as part of everyday human lives.

I am most skilled at full-stack web development which I have done many years now. Additionally, I have also worked with other technologies and areas such as C++/Qt, DevOps, machine learning, architecture and more. I also try to take any chance to grow the previous list as there are always new interesting things to try out.

I have around three years of professional experience as a software developer at Intopalo Digital and Reaktor where I have contributed to various customer projects. I have had the chance to grow, learn new technologies and other relevant skills, solve real problems and have an impact on our customer's businesses.
